page.title: 06Caravan Sites Eastchurch
page.content: In recent years there has been a change in the use of land close to the sea in the Eastchurch area from {farming},to caravan and chalet sites. For many years Londoners have visited these sites during the summer months. The opening of the Olau Line passenger service from Sheerness to Flushing has led to an increase in the number of foreign{tourists.} Most of the{caravans}are owner occupied although a number can be hired for between Â£50 and Â£60 per week. On the more developed sites shops, {entertainments}and sporting facilities are available. Amenities are frequently being improved because of the competition between the sites.
